title: Eldritch Ritual Chamber Adventure #14
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ritual Preparation Chamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit chamber with walls covered in disturbing symbols that seem to writhe in the flickering candlelight. The air is thick with the smell of incense and something older, more primal. Ritual implements are scattered across stone tables. Strange chanting echoes from somewhere deep below. Black candles cast dancing shadows that move independently of their flames.

items.name: stone ritual table
items.description: A dark stone table stained with unidentifiable substances and covered in ritual tools

items.name: ceremonial dagger
items.description: A curved dagger with eldritch symbols etched into the blade

items.name: offering chest
items.description: A wooden chest bound with iron, used to store ritual offerings

items.name: cult manifesto
items.description: A leather-bound document outlining the cult's beliefs
items.text: The Order of the Starless Void was founded in 1923 by High Priest Mordecai Blackwood. We seek communion with the Great Old Ones who dwell beyond the stars. Through ritual and sacrifice, we shall open the gateway and bring forth the Dark Herald from the Void Between Worlds.

items.name: altar of black candles
items.description: An altar with thirteen black candles arranged in a specific pattern

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: An old brass key with a star symbol that hurts to look at directly

items.name: wall inscription
items.description: Strange symbols carved deep into the stone wall
items.text: The inscription reads: 'Only those who know the sacred truths may enter the Archive of Forbidden Knowledge. Beyond lies the Ritual Chamber where the gateway shall open. Speak the name of our Herald, our founder, and the source of our power.'

items.name: robed figure mannequin
items.description: A mannequin wearing dark ceremonial robes

items.name: ritual instructions
items.description: A scroll detailing the ritual process
items.text: Instructions for the Summoning: The ritual must be performed in the Ritual Chamber. High Priest Blackwood has prepared everything. The Dark Herald awaits beyond the Void Between Worlds. Only the initiated may proceed to the Archive.

items.name: iron door
items.description: A heavy iron door covered in protective wards and symbols, leading to the archive

rooms.name: Archive of Forbidden Knowledge
rooms.description: A vast library filled with ancient tomes and scrolls that should not exist. The books seem to whisper secrets in languages that predate humanity. Dust motes float in the air like tiny stars. Strange diagrams cover the walls, showing cosmic geometries that make your eyes water. A sense of vast, incomprehensible knowledge presses down on you.

items.name: ancient reading lectern
items.description: A wooden lectern holding an open book with pages that seem to move on their own
items.text: The Necronomicon excerpt: 'The Dark Herald dwells in the Void Between Worlds, waiting for the stars to align. When the gateway opens in the Ritual Chamber, it shall emerge and remake reality in its image.'

items.name: bookshelf of cosmic lore
items.description: Shelves packed with books about entities beyond human comprehension

items.name: tome of cosmic entities
items.description: A heavy book describing the Great Old Ones
items.text: Chapter VII: The Dark Herald - This entity exists in the Void Between Worlds, a dimension outside normal space and time. It is one of the Great Old Ones, waiting to be summoned by those foolish enough to open the gateway.

items.name: bookshelf of cult history
items.description: Shelves containing records of the cult's activities

items.name: cult history chronicle
items.description: A detailed history of the Order of the Starless Void
items.text: The Order was established by High Priest Mordecai Blackwood in 1923 after he discovered forbidden texts in an expedition to Antarctica. He dedicated his life to preparing the ritual that would summon the Dark Herald and usher in a new age.

items.name: scroll cabinet
items.description: A cabinet with multiple compartments containing rolled scrolls

items.name: summoning scroll
items.description: A scroll with the complete summoning ritual
items.text: The Final Ritual: To complete the summoning, one must enter the Ritual Chamber and speak the three truths: the name of the entity we summon, the name of our founder who showed us the way, and the realm from which the entity shall emerge.

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A silver key that feels unnaturally cold to the touch

items.name: astronomical star chart
items.description: A chart showing constellations that don't match any known astronomy
items.text: The stars align on this night. The gateway between worlds grows thin. The Void Between Worlds touches our reality. The Dark Herald stirs in its cosmic prison, ready to answer our call.

items.name: ritual chamber door
items.description: A massive door carved with scenes of cosmic horror. Three questions are inscribed in glowing script that seems to pulse with otherworldly energy.

password_questions.question: What entity do we summon?
password_questions.hint: Check the cult manifesto and the tome of cosmic entities

password_questions.question: Who founded our order?
password_questions.hint: The cult manifesto and history chronicle mention the founder's full name

password_questions.question: From what realm does it emerge?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts describe where the Dark Herald dwells

rooms.name: Main Ritual Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the eldritch ritual site! A vast circular chamber with a massive summoning circle carved into the floor. The symbols glow with an eerie green light. At the center, a swirling portal of darkness has begun to form - but instead of summoning something through, it offers a way out! The cosmic energies are unstable, creating an escape route back to the normal world. You must leave before the ritual completes!

items.name: massive summoning circle
items.description: An intricate circle of power carved into the stone floor, glowing with eldritch energy

items.name: unstable portal
items.description: A swirling vortex of darkness and stars that offers escape from this nightmare
items.text: The portal pulses with cosmic energy. Rather than bringing something through, the unstable energies have created a rift back to the normal world. This is your chance to escape!

items.name: central ritual altar
items.description: A black stone altar at the center of the summoning circle, covered in strange implements

items.name: statue of the Dark Herald
items.description: A disturbing statue depicting an entity that should not exist, its form hurting to perceive

rooms.win_message: You leap through the unstable portal just as the ritual energies reach their peak! The cosmic forces tear at reality around you, but you emerge safely in the normal world. Behind you, the portal collapses with a sound like reality screaming. You have escaped the Eldritch Ritual Chamber and prevented the summoning. The cult's plans are thwarted, and you live to tell the tale - though no one will believe you. You win!
